High school athlete needs weight set (Longmont)

(google map) (yahoo map)

Hey guys. High school sophomore here that needs your help. I am in need of weights to get stronger for the upcoming season. Our school only offers workouts 3 days a week, which I can only attend 2 of, due to work. I am in need of a weight bar, with weights at a minimum of 100 pounds + the bar.

That being said I will accept any donations to the cause. I can not currently afford much, or really any. All of my money has to go back into food for the week. I have a weight rack, but need a bench, a bar, Olympic or not, and some weights. Any donations are appreciated. Please help me achieve my goal over the offseason.Thank you!
